comments.comment:
### Initialization ###

Se debe crear una opción en el menú para poder importar directamente un directorio al crear un nuevo proyecto en la herramienta.

### Concept Location ###

Importar, Nuevo Proyecto, Opción.

### Impact Analysis ###
Clases que se podrian ver impactadas segun JSwingRipples:

- Jswingripples
- asd

jSwingRipplesApplication manage the project creation with the method createNewProject(), and the option to createNewProject() is manage with the method createMenuBar(), so is important make a dialog window to get the path of the new project.

SourceEditor and AbstractBuildPathEditor manage the path of the project, so we need create class that extends from AbstractBuildPathEditor like SourceEditor but only to call the method addFile() because this method show a dialog window to search for the path.
